ss:description.ss:name: Atlas
ss:description.ss:brief: An ugly, simple but extremely practical design of small freighter which became popular before the rise of the Third Imperium.
ss:description.ss:physical: A boxy design with exterior engine mounts at the rear. Defended by a single top mounted twin turret. It is pretty much useless in an atmosphere, and is not rated for planetary landings.
ss:description.ss:background: Built at Kamurinmur Dockyards, it was a design that quickly became popular due to its cheapness, practicality and ease of manufacture. It has good in-system capability, which reflects a time when trade between systems was less important than trade within a system. Less sophisticated jump software also meant longer journeys in-system after a jump.
